input_email_body:
Subject: Query for Integration with Google Keep Project Management SaaS

Dear Customer Support Team, I am writing to inquire about the detailed documentation and step-by-step instructions for integrating Google Keep into our project management SaaS platform My name is Omar Hassan.. We believe that this integration would significantly enhance the functionality of our platform, providing users with a more streamlined experience You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Could you kindly provide us with the necessary step-by-step instructions for setting up the integration? Additionally, it would be greatly appreciated if you could include relevant screenshots or videos to help illustrate the process. We are also aware of the specific requirements and limitations and would appreciate it if you could inform us about them.
